participant_1.background:
My kids are my first priority, so I wake up early to make sure I have time to drive them to their sports events.
I've had to deal with a lot of loss in my life, but I'm still here.
its cold where i live.
I'll go check my weight again.
My favorite websites are about home improvement and computer programming.

participant_2.background:
I don't wash my clothes as often as I should.
I'm going to be practicing my music and trying to get back into shape for choir.
My biggest fear is not being able to overcome my eating disorder and being stuck in this cycle forever.
I'm not close with my family, but my friends are everything to me.
I enjoy being able to keep my mental faculties sharp by memorizing lines from movies and board games.

content.text: Not too bad! I have to practice my music for choir, but I'm excited to get back into shape.
That's great! What instruments do you play?
I sing! I've been singing since I was a kid.
Oh wow, that's awesome! I used to sing in choir, but I haven't in a long time.
You should start again! It's so much fun.
I know, I know. I've been meaning to, but I'm just too busy with my kids.
I understand! Kids are a lot of work.
They sure are! But they're also the best thing that's ever happened to me.
That's so sweet! I'm not close with my family, so I'm kind of jealous.
I'm sorry to hear that. My family is everything to me.
I'm glad you have that! I'm trying to build a stronger relationship with my friends, but it's hard.
It takes time, but it's worth it. Friends are so important.
I know, I know. I'm working on it!
